mapper.select: select a.import_type as importType, a.customer_id as customerId,b.customer_name as customerName,b.short_name as shortName from report_warehouse_biz_import a LEFT JOIN pub_customer b ON a.customer_id=b.customer_id where import_date = #{importDate} and biz_type = #{bizType} and warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode} AND import_type = 'THEORY' AND a.del_flag = '0' and a.customer_id not in (select customer_id from report_warehouse_biz_import where import_date = #{importDate} and biz_type = #{bizType} and warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode} AND del_flag = '0' AND import_type = 'ACTUAL')
